Human Resource Management System

HRMS

Streamline your HR operations with our comprehensive Human Resource Management System. Manage employees, recruitment, attendance, leaves, payroll, and more all in one place.

Employee

Employee Management

Never forget important events

Be at the forefront of important events of your employees with our HRMS, giving your notifications & reminders of such events!

Key Feature

All Employment data in one place

The employment information can be difficult to organize in one place, however with our HRMS it becomes automatically gets organized in a proper format!

Key Feature
SEE ALL THE SERVICES
Recruitment

Recruitment Process

Source candidates seamlessly

Create Job descriptions with our master templates and post them across social media and Job portals. Get the sourced candidates directly from your mail into the system with our HRMS

Key Feature

Engage in Real Time

Organize, schedule and manage interviews in real-time with reminders and notifications to the candidates and the recruiters/hiring managers!

Key Feature

Onboarding Process

Key Feature

Create and customize your company's offer letters, joining letters and experience cum release letters from our library of templates!

Attendance and Time Logs

Know their whereabouts in Real-time

Now track the whereabouts of your workforce whether they're in office, on break or gone out for a client meet!

Employee

Employee Leaves

Online leave application

Employees can create a leave request and the manager has the option to approve or disapprove the same!

Key Feature

Track & manage overall leaves

The HR and the employees can track their leave quota across several major headings like casual & sick leaves!

Key Feature

Travel

Travel & Expense Claims

Accurate Travel Reimbursement

Our HRMS allows accurate assessment of the travel expenses and provides immediate reimbursement options!

Key Feature

Business Trip Management

Whether it is individual travel or group trips, made for company purposes our HRMS provides measures to properly account for transportation and stay expenses!

Key Feature

Salary

Salary & Payroll Processing

Manage salary, deductions & incentives

Get a proper breakdown of employee salaries in a designated format accounting for the tax & other deductions and perks/incentives with our HRMS!

Key Feature

Create salary slips from our predefined customizable templates and get reports and analytics on CTC of employees!
